name: Funil de Vendas
query: SELECT SUM(Negocios.montante) as montante, options.name as name, options.option_order FROM Negocios JOIN options ON options.name = Negocios.est_gio WHERE options.module = 'Negocios' GROUP BY options.name, options.option_order ORDER BY options.option_order;
